blogPost.excerpt: 9 months after we initially launched on Chrome, Motion Firefox is finally here! Motion is an all-in-one time management tool that helps you get things done: by helping you maximize focus time, group meetings together, easily send availabilities, and focus.
blogPost.body: 9 months after we initially launched on Chrome, Motion Firefox is finally here! Motion is an all-in-one time management tool that helps you get things done: by helping you maximize focus time, group meetings together, easily send availabilities, and focus.
blogPost.title: Motion Firefox - All-in-one time management tool in Firefox
blogPost.author: Harry Qi

localize.description: 在我们最初在Chrome浏览器上推出9个月后，Motion Firefox终于来了! Motion是一款集所有功能于一身的时间管理工具，它可以帮助你完成任务：通过帮助你最大限度地利用焦点时间，一起召开小组会议，轻松发送空闲时间，并集中精力。
localize.tagline: 火狐中的一体化时间管理工具

localize.description: 在我們最初在Chrome瀏覽器上推出9個月後，Motion Firefox終於來了! Motion是一款集所有功能於一身的時間管理工具，它可以幫助你完成任務：通過幫助你最大限度地利用焦點時間，一起召開小組會議，輕鬆發送空閒時間，並集中精力。
localize.tagline: 火狐中的一體化時間管理工具

previous.excerpt: Get yourself comfortable, turn your phone so the flashlight is facing you, close your eyes then fall effortlessly into an immersive journey through a kaleidoscope of colours created by your subconscious...
previous.title: Lumenate - Effortlessly explore your subconscious

localize.description: 让自己舒服一点，把手机转过来，让手电筒面对着你，闭上眼睛，然后毫不费力地陷入由你的潜意识所创造的万花筒式色彩的沉浸式旅程中。
localize.tagline: 轻松地探索你的潜意识

localize.description: 讓自己舒服一點，把手機轉過來，讓手電筒面對着你，閉上眼睛，然後毫不費力地陷入由你的潛意識所創造的萬花筒式色彩的沉浸式旅程中。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆地探索你的潛意識

next.excerpt: Around is a lightweight video collaboration tool that floats on your desktop, perfect for things like design sessions, brainstorms, and code reviews. Available for download. Now comes with EchoTerminator.
next.title: Around 2.0 - Video calls for the future of hybrid-remote work

localize.description: Around是一个轻量级的视频协作工具，漂浮在你的桌面上，非常适合设计会议、头脑风暴和代码审查等。可供下载。现在附带EchoTerminator。
localize.tagline: 视频呼唤混合-远程工作的未来。

localize.description: Around是一個輕量級的視頻協作工具，漂浮在你的桌面上，非常適合設計會議、頭腦風暴和代碼審查等。可供下載。現在附帶EchoTerminator。
localize.tagline: 視頻呼喚混合-遠程工作的未來。
